Class SaResultsTab

    Class that handles the tabs for the preview of the S.A.s results.
    Author:
    George

    • Method Detail

      • populateResultTextArea

        public static void populateResultTextArea(JTextPane ta,
                                          String sa,
                                          Date start,
                                          Date end,
                                          boolean saSpecific)
        It populates the result text area with the actual results after parsing them from xml.
        Parameters:
        ta - The text area to use.
        sa - If showing results for only one S.A., the S.A. to show results for.
        start - The starting date from which the results should be shown.
        end - The ending date till which the results should be shown.
        saSpecific - A boolean showing if all S.A.s' results will be show or only for one S.A..

      • populateSAWithResultsList

        public static void populateSAWithResultsList(JComboBox<String> cb)
        It populated the drop down list with S.A.s which have results.
        Parameters:
        cb - The combo box element to populate.
